item.endrem.old_eye.description: 传说这颗眼睛曾属于一只巨沙虫
item.endrem.rogue_eye.description: 据说它赋予了祖先红石智慧
item.endrem.nether_eye.description: 在下界与天界的战斗中，一个恶魔弄丢了它
item.endrem.cold_eye.description: 它是冰术师灭绝之前留下的最终神器之一
item.endrem.magical_eye.description: 若无此眼，唤魔者无异于蝼蚁
item.endrem.black_eye.description: 海盗说它可以让人看到传说中的黑珍珠号
item.endrem.lost_eye.description: 据悉它是由最早的铁匠锻造而成的
item.endrem.wither_eye.description: 它见证了毁灭，也许还会见证你的物品消失
item.endrem.guardian_eye.description: 它见证了许多战士沉沦于深渊
item.endrem.cursed_eye.description: §7§oA powerful yet destructive artifact; the Piglins swore to protect it at the cost of their lives
item.endrem.exotic_eye.description: §7§oThose who followed this eye were never seen again; rumors say they found the great city of Atlantis, or lost their way trying
item.endrem.evil_eye.description: §7§oA holy talisman said to protect its owner from bad luck
item.endrem.undead_eye.description: §7§oRemembrance of the past lives of those who live in death
item.endrem.corrupted_eye.description: 逝于孤独的贪婪国王之眼。传说它会带来无尽的财富
item.endrem.witch_eye.description: 据说它看到了失传的古老酿造配方
block.endrem.ender_eye.throw_warning: This eye doesn't know where to go
block.endrem.ender_eye.use_warning: This eye doesn't want to be used
block.endrem.custom_eye.frame_has_eye: This frame already has an eye
block.endrem.custom_eye.broken: This portal is not built properly
